title: Want to buy: "A" grade / trimmed / low grade that look NM
author: T206.org

posts.post_title: Want to buy: "A" grade / trimmed / low grade that look NM
posts.post_content:
Hi all,

I am working on a binder set and looking for "A" grade / trimmed or low grade T206 that have sharp corners, and are crease free, and well registered.

Please let me know if you've got anything... my monster number is only 189, so my want list is long.

Below is a St. Patricks Day themed example of the type of cards I am after.

Thank you!

[img]http://www.t206.org/misc/StPattyT206-sm.png[/img]
